评论概述: It’s a Gamble - You may get a great one or you may not!
评论详情: I bought one of these size XS which was great! I decided I liked it so much I wanted to buy second one. The second XS one that arrived was stretched out in the elastic and smelled like tires! I returned that one, and got another one also XS size, which is also stretched out, too big, and one of the shoulder seams is unstitched. Unfortunately I went to wear it today for the first time, realized it’s too big and missed the return window by one day. ☹️ Yes, I should’ve tried it on before given Rent-the-Runway’s history from what I’ve received. I thought the window for returns was longer…
This garment was not in acceptable condition, even for a previously worn item
